product_summary: Proust is an easy-to-use video transcription tool that helps you quickly and accurately transcribe your YouTube videos. With its powerful AI technology, Proust can transcribe videos in over 100 languages. It also offers a range of features to help you edit and manage your transcripts, making it the perfect tool for anyone who needs to transcribe videos.
product_pros: Range of editing and management features
product_cons: May not be suitable for transcribing very long videos
May not be able to transcribe videos with poor audio quality
Can be slow to transcribe videos

product_usecases.details: Proust can be used to create subtitles for your YouTube videos. This can help you make your videos more accessible to viewers who are deaf or hard of hearing, or who speak a different language.
Proust can be used to generate transcripts of your YouTube videos for research purposes. This can help you analyze the content of your videos, identify key themes, and track changes over time.

Proust can be used to transcribe interviews for research, journalism, or other purposes. This can help you quickly and easily capture the key points of an interview, and make it easier to search and organize your transcripts.

Proust can be used to create marketing materials, such as transcripts of webinars, presentations, and speeches. This can help you repurpose your content into different formats, and make it more accessible to your audience.

Proust can be used to transcribe educational content, such as lectures, presentations, and tutorials. This can help you make your content more accessible to students, and make it easier for them to learn.

product_toolfor.details: Proust is a great tool for content creators who need to transcribe their YouTube videos. It can help you quickly and easily create transcripts that you can use for subtitles, research, marketing materials, and more.

Proust is a valuable tool for researchers who need to transcribe interviews, presentations, and other audio content. It can help you quickly and easily generate transcripts that you can use for analysis, coding, and more.

Proust can be used by journalists to transcribe interviews, press conferences, and other events. This can help you quickly and easily capture the key points of an event, and make it easier to write your articles.

Proust is a great tool for educators who need to transcribe lectures, presentations, and other educational content. It can help you make your content more accessible to students, and make it easier for them to learn.

Proust can be used by businesses to transcribe webinars, presentations, and other marketing materials. This can help you repurpose your content into different formats, and make it more accessible to your audience.

product_pricing: Proust offers a free plan that allows you to transcribe up to 30 minutes of video per month. Paid plans start at $10 per month, and offer unlimited transcription time and additional features.
